sca-related-projects.name: Veracode-Get-EPSS-Info
sca-related-projects.description: Gets all the SCA findings available to the user, including EPSS scores and percentiles.

sca-related-projects.name: Veracode-SCA-Webhook-Redirect
sca-related-projects.description: This Project exposes a Tomcat server that can redirect Veracode Agent-based SCA web hooks to Teams and Slack.

sca-related-projects.name: yarn-v2-workspaces-helper
sca-related-projects.description: Creates yarn.lock files for each workspace to make the whole project scannable with Veracode's SCA solution. this is specifically for yarn version 2 and lower

sca-related-projects.name: yarn-v3-workspaces-helper
sca-related-projects.description: Creates yarn.lock files for each workspace to make the whole project scannable with Veracode's SCA solution. this is specifically for yarn version 3 and higher

sca-related-projects.name: veracode-bulk-cve-suppression
sca-related-projects.description: Allows for bulk suppression of specific CVE across full application portfolio
